        Filters articles and checks whether they are included in given category.
        Returns:
        all Articles, which are not reserved and are of given category

      • findAllActiveAndForRentalArticles

        public java.util.List<Article> findAllActiveAndForRentalArticles()
        Finds all article which have active=true and forRental=true.
        Returns:
        all non-active, not rented articles.

      • deactivateArticle

        public boolean deactivateArticle(java.lang.Long articleId)
        Deactivates an article by ID to hide it from all users and prohibit further cases. Checks, if article is present by looking for ID key. If fails, throw Exception. If article is not being reserved (a.k.a bound to running case) and free to book, deactivate article. Else, throw Exception.
        Parameters:
        articleId - ID of article to be "deleted".
        Returns:
        boolean True, if succeeded. False, if encountered error while processing request.

      • findAllArticlesByName

        public java.util.List<Article> findAllArticlesByName(java.lang.String searchString)
        Returns List of all articles, which name contains the given search string. Case of letters is ignored.
